dict.acceptation: 支持者，拥护者；支持物；赡养者，抚养者；

sent.orig: I am a supporter an Italian supporter.
sent.trans: 我是一名意大利足球的支持者。

sent.orig: The third sample reduced the heat resistance of shell and added a copper supporter in core.
sent.trans: 试件一在压力下变形较大，试件二的壳体热阻较大，试件三减小了壳体热阻，并加了支撑铜芯。

sent.orig: Holt became a sought-after speaker and supporter of school reform.
sent.trans: 霍尔特后来成为广受欢迎的演说家，积极倡导教学改革。

sent.orig: A fourth supporter was banned for a pitch incursion.
sent.trans: 此外，还有1名球迷在赛后试图冲进场内袭击他人。

sent.orig: Supporter spokesperson's nationalities match up to their city of birth.
sent.trans: 球迷发言人的国籍匹配他们出生的城市。
